info.title: WLGAFC student became a silver feature of the International Windows competition
info.short_text:
Diana Bogdanova ' s first course at the Great Academy of Physical Culture and Sports was the silver prize of the International Velocross competition.

The contests took place on 20 and 21 in the Archipo-Osipovke of Krasnodar Province. Diane Bogdanova finished the second among women of the Circes.

info.title: Rostelcom improved communications by replacing equipment in Pskov province
info.short_text:
erid: LjN8K5kWr
In 2023, Rostelek continued to implement a programme to upgrade end-of-life equipment for the Internet and television to Pskov oblasts. We recall that the project started in 2021, since then, company specialists replaced 85 per cent of the Wi-Fi facilities, about 47 per cent of the total last year.

info.title: The preliminary results of the merger of the Great Inter-District Hospital were known
info.short_text:
The Chief Medical Officer of the Pskov Regional Clinical Hospital of Evgeny Panferov informed the PAI about the preliminary results of the association with the Great Inter-Rain Hospital.

info.title: The generosity is inviting the police.
info.short_text: The Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia, through the city of the Greater Luka, is inviting candidates for the posts of police officer, police officer(s) of a separate company for the protection and escort of suspects and accused persons, inspector of the DPS, police officer(s) of the patrol service, in the posts of pre-investigator, investigator and local police commissioner.

info.title: The last veteran of the Great Patriotic War, who lived in the Great Town region, died
info.short_text:
The last veteran of the Great Patriotic War, who lived in the Great Town, Sergei Gostenkov, left his life. This has been reported in a group of newspapers in the Great Lakes region, Our Route.

Sergei Semenović was born on 31 January 1926 in the village of Orehnovo in the Greater Town Region.

On 29 November 1943, he was assigned to the Red Army. Served first by a 359-supposed SALF machine, then by a 60-small wing machine.

info.title: The inhabitants of Pskov province were again caught in the catch of frauds.
info.short_text: On 22 and 23 January, in Pscowe and the Great Luka, six users of the Gosu-service site called strangers who were represented by members of the cell company. And under the pretext of prolonging the contracts for the maintenance of the SIM card, it was alleged that the personal offices of the trusted citizens were not properly accessible and that their records were blocked.

info.title: The wolves attacked an " Hot Live " orphanage.

The wolves attacked the HOCHU VITI shelter, located in the village of Antonovo Opoček district

Daddy. Men! We have wolves attacking the shelter today! Ele's been hit... Request help. A week ago, less specimen.

info.title: The grand jury fined an alien for 40,000 roubles.
info.short_text: A citizen of the Republic of Tajikistan has been unlawfully present in the territory of the Russian Federation since 6 January 2024. He has not had documents confirming the right to remain in the country.
